body_html: (Also the reason for checking out_edges() == 1 is that if there are two downstream consumers of the op, one on CPU and one on GPU, which device should you put the op on? This heuristic was meant to avoid any ambiguity).
body_text: (Also the reason for checking out_edges() == 1 is that if there are two downstream consumers of the op, one on CPU and one on GPU, which device should you put the op on?  This heuristic was meant to avoid any ambiguity).
body: (Also the reason for checking out_edges() == 1 is that if there are two downstream consumers of the op, one on CPU and one on GPU, which device should you put the op on?  This heuristic was meant to avoid any ambiguity).
